languages.text: {n}Подле стола, на котором покоится тело, видны маленькие амулеты, изготовленные из перегоревших плат когитаторов. Эти малые подношения не покрыты пылью — видно, что оставлены они были недавно.{/n}
{n}Next to the table the body is resting on, you see small amulets crafted from burned cogitator circuit boards. There is no dust on these small offerings. They were clearly left here recently.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Подле стола, на котором покоится тело, видны маленькие амулеты, изготовленные из перегоревших плат когитаторов. Эти малые подношения не покрыты пылью — видно, что оставлены они были недавно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Next to the table the body is resting on, you see small amulets crafted from burned cogitator circuit boards. There's no dust on these small offerings. They were clearly left here recently.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Neben dem Tisch, auf dem die Leiche ruht, siehst du kleine Amulette, die aus verbrannten Platinen von Cogitatoren hergestellt wurden. Auf diesen kleinen Opfergaben befindet sich kein Staub. Sie wurden offenbar erst kürzlich hier abgelegt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Next to the table the body is resting on, you see small amulets crafted from burned cogitator circuit boards. There is no dust on these small offerings. They were clearly left here recently.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Neben dem Tisch, auf dem die Leiche ruht, siehst du kleine Amulette, die aus verbrannten Platinen von Cogitatoren hergestellt wurden. Auf diesen kleinen Opfergaben befindet sich kein Staub. Sie wurden offenbar erst kürzlich hier abgelegt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Près de la table sur laquelle est allongé le cadavre se trouvent de petites amulettes fabriquées à partir de circuits imprimés grillés de cogitateur et sur lesquelles il ne semble pas y avoir le moindre grain de poussière. Elles n'ont sans doute été posées ici que tout récemment.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Next to the table the body is resting on, you see small amulets crafted from burned cogitator circuit boards. There is no dust on these small offerings. They were clearly left here recently.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Près de la table sur laquelle est allongé le cadavre se trouvent de petites amulettes fabriquées à partir de circuits imprimés grillés de cogitateur et sur lesquelles il ne semble pas y avoir le moindre grain de poussière. Elles n'ont sans doute été posées ici que tout récemment.{/n}

languages.text: {n}陈放这具尸体的桌子旁边，摆着用损毁沉思者电路板制成的小护身符。这些小护身符上没有任何灰尘，显然是最近才摆在这里的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Next to the table the body is resting on, you see small amulets crafted from burned cogitator circuit boards. There is no dust on these small offerings. They were clearly left here recently.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}陈放这具尸体的桌子旁边，摆着用损毁思考器电路板制成的小护身符。这些小护身符上没有任何灰尘，显然是最近才摆在这里的。{/n}

languages.text: {n}遺体が横たわるテーブルの隣には、燃えた考算機の回路基板から作られた小さなアミュレットがある。このような捧げ物にはチリひとつない。最近納められた物であることは明らかだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Next to the table the body is resting on, you see small amulets crafted from burned cogitator circuit boards. There is no dust on these small offerings. They were clearly left here recently.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}遺体が横たわるテーブルの隣には、燃えた考算機の回路基板から作られた小さなアミュレットがある。こうした捧げ物にはチリひとつない。最近納められた物であることは明らかだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Al lado de la mesa en la que descansa el cuerpo ves pequeños amuletos hechos con placas de circuitos de cogitadores quemadas. No hay polvo en estas pequeñas ofrendas. Es evidente que las han dejado aquí hace poco.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Next to the table the body is resting on, you see small amulets crafted from burned cogitator circuit boards. There is no dust on these small offerings. They were clearly left here recently.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Al lado de la mesa en la que descansa el cuerpo ves pequeños amuletos hechos con placas de circuitos de cogitadores quemadas. No hay polvo en estas pequeñas ofrendas. Es evidente que las han dejado aquí hace poco.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cesedin uzandığı masanın yanında, yanmış kavramsayar devre kartlarından üretilmiş ufak uğurluklar görüyorsun. Bu küçük adakların üzerinde toz birikmemiş. Buraya yakın zamanda bırakıldıkları belli oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Next to the table the body is resting on, you see small amulets crafted from burned cogitator circuit boards. There is no dust on these small offerings. They were clearly left here recently.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cesedin uzandığı masanın yanında, yanmış kavramsayar devre kartlarından üretilmiş ufak uğurluklar görüyorsun. Bu küçük adakların üzerinde toz birikmemiş. Buraya yakın zamanda bırakıldıkları belli oluyor.{/n}
